selectedVerses.text: At the same time he hoped that money would be given him by Paul. So he sent for him often and conversed with him.

Now in the twelfth month, which is the month of Adar, on the thirteenth day of the same, when the king's command and edict were about to be carried out, on the very day when the enemies of the Jews hoped to gain the mastery over them, the reverse occurred: the Jews gained mastery over those who hated them.
If in this life only we have hoped in Christ, we are of all people most to be pitied.
For this is how the holy women who hoped in God used to adorn themselves, by submitting to their husbands,
Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
